title: Phish - PMCLP 1994 Part 2 (Pretty Much Complete Live Phish)
description:
Phish - PMCLP 1994 Part 2 (Pretty Much Complete Live Phish)

This is a repost of a Demonoid torrent, "Pretty Much Complete Live Phish" (PMCLP).  Basically, it is a catalog of "pretty much" every Phish show in circulation from before 10/07/2000 (Phish ended their first hiatus on 12/31/2002, and henceforth all recordings have been available via LivePhish).  Some are SBD, but by far mostly AUD; all have recording info; all are tagged, and even have artwork which corresponds to the ticket stub or venue; NONE of this is in FLAC:  This is exactly how this torrent was seeded about 5 years ago.  Some are 320, but most are lower bitrates.  However, the point is that many - if not most - of these recordings are not available at bt.etree.org...but if they are, I heartily suggest you head over there and download that and any other shows you like in wonderful FLAC.  If I find that any of these shows are available via bt.etree.org in FLAC I will upload that as well.  I am offering this collection up because it is comprehensive:  it really does comprise almost every Phish show in circulation from before the first hiatus.  I am really anal about FLAC/320 just like most of you, but the vast majority of these shows offered here are not presently available in the bittorrent community in any other format (although, once again, some are available at bt.etree.org, and some though Phish.com).

This is the eighth of roughly 50 torrents which comprise the whole collection, which goes from 1984 - 2000, and the second for 1994.

Here are the shows included in this installment, 1994 part 02:

1994-04-23 The Fox Theatre, Atlanta GA (AUD)
1994-04-24 Grady Cole Center, Charlotte NC (AUD)
1994-04-25 Civic Auditorium, Knoxville TN (SBD)
1994-04-26 Purple Dragon Recording Studios, Atlanta GA (Outtakes)
1994-04-28 SunFest, West Palm Beach FL (AUD)
1994-04-29 Boatyard Village Pavilion, Clearwater FL (AUD)
1994-04-30 The Edge Night Club, Orlando FL (AUD-SBD)
1994-05-02 Five Points South Music Hall, Birmingham AL (AUD)
1994-05-03 Starwood Amphitheater, Antioch TN (AUD-SBD)
1994-05-04 State Palace Theatre, New Orleans LA (AUD)
1994-05-06 Tower Theater, Houston TX (Set 2 AUD)
1994-05-07 The Bomb Factory, Dallas TX (LPS)
1994-05-08 The Backyard, Bee Cave TX (AUD)
1994-05-10 Paolo Soleri Amphitheatre, Santa Fe NM (AUD)
1994-05-12 Buena Vista Theater, Tuscon AZ (AUD)
1994-05-13 Hayden Square, Tempe AZ (AUD)
1994-05-14 Montezuma Hall, San Diego State University, San Diego CA (SBD)
